title: Since Civilization Collapsed and Tokyo Became Full of Monsters, I Would Like To Live Freely With Cheat Skills - Novel Updates

description:
The sudden unprecedented earthquake and flood of monsters disrupt Japan. At that time, a mysterious announcement enters the brain of Hideto Tsukishiro.

“Your skill is [Creation].”

Mankind gets drunk with the sudden threat of monsters and the ability to fight using skills.

On the other hand, Hideto researches skills and refines the technique of living alone. Can even Hideto can always have a companion?
>
